sections.purpose: To apply disinfectant solutions uniformly on laboratory surfaces and equipment.
sections.scope: Applicable to infection control and biosafety in pharmacology labs.
procedure: Fill the sprayer reservoir with freshly prepared disinfectant solution.
Label the sprayer with the disinfectant name and concentration.
Adjust the nozzle to achieve a fine spray.
Spray surfaces from an appropriate distance to ensure full coverage.
Allow the recommended contact time before wiping if required.
Empty and rinse the sprayer at the end of the day.
Store in a clean, dry area away from direct sunlight.
precautions: Wear appropriate PPE including gloves and mask.
Do not mix different disinfectants in the sprayer.
Avoid spraying near open flames or electrical outlets.
Prepare solutions according to manufacturer dilution instructions.
Dispose of leftover disinfectant according to institutional SOPs.
